sentences: Rikako Aida (逢田 梨香子, Aida Rikako, born 8 August 1992), previously known with the stage name Rikako Itō (伊藤 梨花子, Itō Rikako), is a Japanese actress and singer.
She is best known for her role as Riko Sakurauchi from Love Live!
Sunshine!!.
She is affiliated with Ken Production.
In 2019, her song "Ordinary Love" was used as the ending theme to the anime series Senryu Girl.
Her song "for..." is used as the opening theme to the anime series Val x Love.
